page.title: 10"Metheringham Swimming Pool"
page.content: Metheringham swimming pool has been open since 1975, It used to be run by the Education Authority and is now run by a voluntary committee. {How it is run.} There are 12 committee member. In addition other people do the gate and lifeguarding if qualified.We have four pool organisers who test the water and put chlorine in.It has a boiler house with two boilers in and also equipment for the Knockout Competition.In the grounds is a hut which sells sweets etc.We earn Â£20.00 per session.{ { Prices and Times.} Evenings {Monday}morning & afternoon{Adults }60p {Tuesday}school use {Wednesday}each week day{Public}30p 45p {Thursday {Friday Lessons} Â£1.00 {Saturday Public }30p 45p {Sunday Public }30p 45p
